title: 15 min Abs and Hip Workout | Pilates for Beginners
description:
In this 15-minute gentle Pilates routine, we will guide you through a series of exercises that focus on strengthening and toning your abs and hips, perfect for anyone wanting a slower and more gentle Pilates workout. These low-impact exercises can also help relieve back pain. Combine it with another workout or use it as a standalone workout. Roll out your mat and let's get started.

channelDescription:
My Pilates-based programs and classes will teach you how to reset your mind and begin a deeper connection to your body through movement. If you want to build balance, core strength, flexibility, and find freedom within your body – you've come to the right place. Join me now and take steps towards feeling our absolute best through balancing your body and mind. Trust yourself, listen to your body, and find what moves you. 

Keep moving and good things will happen,
Mira xxx

comments: 💖 Try your FREE 5 Day Beginner Program https://www.flowwithmira.com/7-day-beginner-flow-challenge-sign-up
I really liked this workout. I could actually participate. The teacher is calm and explains the exercises well. No crazy music, which I really appreciate.
Greater pointers throughout, and love how unlike so many other workout videos on YouTube there’s no obnoxious music or cheesy pep talks. Thank you! 😊
This is my favorite workout! So short but I can feel my muscles engaging so much- thank you!!
The last exercise for the hips activated muscles I've never even felt. I'll definitely go back to these
